breakfast.description: 6 whole eggs + 200 g shrimp omelette + veggies

postSurfShake.description: 2 scoops Critical Whey Vanilla + 5 g creatine

lunch.description: 450 g salmon steak (skin on) + grilled veggies + sauerkraut

training: Belt Squat Machine 3 sets (3,3,2 reps @ 20 kg); Kneeling Leg Curl unilateral 3 sets (6,7,8 reps each leg @ 50–60 lbs total); Glute Machine 2 sets (7,8 reps @ 40–60 kg); Hip Abductor Machine 3 sets (8,8,8 reps @ 30 lbs). Notes: First gym session without surf – solid start. Strength up despite no creatine in evening shake. Next session add 10 kg to all. Sleep 6.8 hrs – no big damage, back to 8+ hrs tonight.
notes: DAY 13 LEGENDARY – Fasted 86.2 kg (-3.8 kg from Day 1). 518 g protein, 1.40 kg edible seafood demolished. Evening shake 2 scoops without creatine as requested. Streak = 13.
